page.title: 07 Houses/Churches
page.content:
{Houses-cont Lanchester,however,has several private estates,the earliest built in 1963-65, and the latest in 1985.A four bedroom detached house here costs between Â£50,000-Â£60,000. Although most are now built of brick, the older houses (oldest-1690)were built of stone mined from nearby Maiden Law Quarry,which is no longer in existance.Most houses have gas- fired central heating. A typical two bedroomed terrace house in Burnhope sells for approx. Â£11,000,where as the same house in Lanchester would fetch between Â£20,000-Â£23,000.
{Churches There are five churches/chapels in our block:-All Saints Church,
